definition: water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes
flour/noodles/(of food) soft (not crunchy)/(slang) (of a person) ineffectual/spineless
face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc
to float up (idiom); to become evident/to surface/to appear

sentences.english: Ice is not as dense as water and it therefore floats.
sentences.chinese: 冰的密度比水小，因此能浮在水面上。

sentences.english: There was a thin curst of dirt around the bath.
sentences.chinese: 水面上浮有一层薄薄的油。

sentences.english: The effect of real-time water surface can consumedly enhance the immersion characteristic of virtual reality system.
sentences.chinese: 实时水面效果可以大大增强虚拟现实系统的沉浸感。

sentences.english: Birds floating so close together in some places that she couldn't see the water.
sentences.chinese: 于某处游在一起以致她看不到水面。

sentences.english: Yet there may be another supercycle emerging – that is, for gold.
sentences.chinese: 而另一场大牛市可能正在浮出水面，那就是黄金。

sentences.english: He came out from the water immediately, climbed up the bank, and made off for home at once.
sentences.chinese: 他迅速浮出水面，上岸后撒腿就往家跑。

sentences.english: The fish are rising; perhaps we'll catch one.
sentences.chinese: 鱼浮上水面来了，也许我们能捕捉一条。

sentences.english: Gathering them unemotionally will help those facts come out.
sentences.chinese: 非情绪化地收集事实会帮助那些事实浮出水面。

sentences.english: This kind of single-lung fish can live up to 12 hours when out of water.
sentences.chinese: 这种单肺鱼离开水面能生存多达12小时。

sentences.english: Sunlight reflecting off the water’s surface gives it a pale, silvery blue color.
sentences.chinese: 水面上太阳光反射让水面呈现出银白蓝色。

sentences.english: Sunlight reflecting off the water’s surface gives it a pale, silvery blue color.
sentences.chinese: 水面上太阳光反射让水面呈现出银白蓝色。

sentences.english: Remaining in the deep water for a while, she begins to kick her way up towards the surface.
sentences.chinese: 她在深水中逗留片刻之后开始踢打着水向水面游去。

sentences.english: The torchlight swung across the little beach and out over the water, searching.
sentences.chinese: 手电筒的光在小海滩上扫过，而后照向水面搜索着。

sentences.english: Harry had considerable success dapping with the natural fly.
sentences.chinese: 哈里用真蝇轻点水面钓鱼相当成功。

sentences.english: Most waves are caused by winds blowing over the surface of the water.
sentences.chinese: 波浪大抵都是由风吹过水面而引起的。

definition: Shuili township in Nantou county 南投縣|南投县[Nan2 tou2 xian4], central Taiwan
Huli district of Xiamen city 廈門市|厦门市[Xia4 men2 shi4] (Amoy), Fujian
Hunei township in Kaohsiung county 高雄縣|高雄县[Gao1 xiong2 xian4], southwest Taiwan
